item.name: BANG!
item.comment:
It's fun to shoot somebody sometimes ;) But seriously - it's a good game.
The only two drawbacks are:
1. You can be killed before You start you're turn
2. You have to play with at least 4 friends because a four player game is too boring and predictable.

item.name: Battles of Westeros
item.comment: It's a very good but not very hard strategy. Defenetaly better, quicker and easier than Tide of Iron.

item.name: Battles of Westeros: Wardens of the North
Battles of Westeros: Wardens of the West
Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game
Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game – Sudden Death
Carcassonne
item.comment: A great game if You have friends who are starting their journey with boardgames

item.name: Catan
item.comment: Every time if I have unexpirienced players I suggest to play Catan. In my opinion it's a great gateway to board games

item.name: Epic Spell Wars of the Battle Wizards: Duel at Mt. Skullzfyre
item.comment: A very funny game, but sometimes it can bore You to death.

item.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple
Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Doomed
A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)
item.comment: Absolutely great! For everybody!!!

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game
iKNOW
item.comment: It's defenetaly a good quiz game, but it's very, very hard...

item.name: Jungle Speed Safari
item.comment: Best party game ever!

item.name: King of Tokyo
item.comment: Absolutely one of the best family and party games ever!

item.name: Legacy: The Testament of Duke de Crecy
item.comment: I randomly like worker placement games. But this one is great. The topic and graphics make it so fun to play!

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
The Magnates: A Game of Power
Mansions of Madness
item.comment: A great cooperative game. In my opinion harder, tougher and better than Horror in Arkham.

item.name: Marvel Dice Masters: Avengers vs. X-Men
Mount Everest
item.comment: The best Adam Kałuża game I've played :)

item.name: Neuroshima Hex!
item.comment: a quick, great game not only for Neuroshima fans. It's great for competitions!

item.name: Neuroshima Hex! Steel Police
item.comment: a great expansion! Must to have for every Hex fan!

item.name: Pandemic
item.comment: It just gest me! And it's quite esasy to play, so I can pull it off with everybody :)

item.name: Racial Wars: Flight over the desert
item.comment: It's a very good card game. It has fantastic graphics and solid rules.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island – Voyage of the Beagle (Vol. 1)
Sigismundus Augustus: Dei gratia rex Poloniae
Small World
item.comment: A great strategy for everybody. It's light, quick and fun!

Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game: Space Marine Pack 1
Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game
item.comment: If You are a Star Wars fan this game is a must!

Terra Mystica
item.comment: Normally this kind of games bore me (for example Caylus or Tzolkin) but Terra is absolutely one of the best, if not the best, economic-strategic games I've played.

item.name: Ticket to Ride
item.comment: LOVE IT !!

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Europe
item.comment: One of my favourite games. I love it :)

item.name: Wakanda
item.comment: A game has to be more than pretty to be good...

item.name: Містеріум
item.comment: It's a solid game. Some may say that is better to play Dixit, but I don't see so much similarities. Only the core mechanic is quite similar.
